title: Crowdsourced Urban Artmap
description: Urban art, including graffiti, murals, and street installations, often goes undocumented and underappreciated due to its ephemeral nature and lack of visibility. This project aims to create a platform where urban art enthusiasts can document, share, and explore urban artworks from around the world, preserving them digitally for a global audience.

title: Dost (Frnd Finder)
description: Dost: Building Meaningful Connections through Shared Passions. In today's fast-paced world, finding friends who share your interests can be a challenge. Dost, which translates to "friend" in Hindi, aims to bridge this gap by leveraging the power of technology to connect you with like-minded individuals.

title: Natours - A Tour Booking Website
description: Developed web application to book dream destination of users. Book Destinations Dynamically Using Stripe
